My journey

I'm a former Metallurgist with passion towards design and currently residing in Warangal, India. I recently shifted my career into a full time junior frontend developer in the process of rediscovering my creative outlets. I strive to create usable and polished products through passionate and deliberate design.
A childhood curiosity of learning how to type and the other using virtual “lego” interfaced code blocks to build a functional code that lights a bulb or moves the toy according to the instructions, had set me gradually on to the path of design.
Though I come from an Engineering background as a metallurgist, who is fascinated by the planning of creation might someday also get a chance to infuse these vast fields into one to obtaining solutions that attune in the global community in usable and economically viable.
